About Me

Web developer | Programmer | Data Analyst

BIO

I am a software development student currently seeking to secure a co-op position in software development, data analysis, or software testing/QA by leveraging comprehensive training in web application development and database management, along with my background in business development and analysis.

Customer Set-up Agent

Waste Management

  • Analyzed sales and operations data to identify revenue leakage sources, inventory issues, and customer satisfaction root causes.
  • Processed more than 200 sales orders per week, exceeding company standard, while maintaining 98% accuracy.
  • Streamlined sales and operations reporting by creating root cause investigation procedure and automated Excel spreadsheet templates.
  • Proposed several improvement initiatives to reduce processing errors.
  • Provided training for new employees (interdepartmental) and auditing customer records.
